languages.text: Управляйте колониями удаленно через меню колоний [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].
You can manage your colonies remotely using the colony management screen [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].
languages.original_text: Управляйте колониями удаленно через меню колоний [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].

traits.locale_text: You can manage your colonies remotely using the colony management screen [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}]. Note that rewards can only be claimed by visiting the colony in person.

languages.text: 您可以按下[{bind|OpenColonyManagement}]打开殖民地管理界面，远程管理您的殖民地。
languages.original_text: You can manage your colonies remotely using the colony management screen [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].

traits.locale_text: 您可以按下[{bind|OpenColonyManagement}]打开殖民地管理界面，远程管理您的殖民地。

languages.text: コロニー管理画面でコロニーを遠隔管理することができる[{bind|OpenColonyManagement}]。
languages.original_text: You can manage your colonies remotely using the colony management screen [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].

traits.locale_text: コロニー管理画面でコロニーを遠隔管理することができる[{bind|OpenColonyManagement}]。

languages.text: Puedes gestionar tus colonias a distancia usando la pantalla de gestión de colonia [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].
languages.original_text: You can manage your colonies remotely using the colony management screen [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].

traits.locale_text: Puedes gestionar tus colonias a distancia usando la pantalla de gestión de colonia [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].

languages.text: Du kannst deine Kolonien aus der Ferne über den Bildschirm für die Kolonieverwaltung [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}] verwalten.
languages.original_text: You can manage your colonies remotely using the colony management screen [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].

traits.locale_text: Du kannst deine Kolonien aus der Ferne über den Bildschirm für die Kolonieverwaltung [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}] verwalten.

languages.text: Vous pouvez gérer vos colonies à distance en utilisant l'écran de gestion des colonies [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].
languages.original_text: You can manage your colonies remotely using the colony management screen [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].

traits.locale_text: Vous pouvez gérer vos colonies à distance en utilisant l'écran de gestion des colonies [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].

languages.text: Koloni yönetimi ekranını [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}] kullanarak kolonilerini uzaktan yönetebilirsin.
